description.en: Innate abilities are for magic, and acquired wisdom has mechanisms. But who would have thought that there is such a shocking secret behind the inscription? Guo Shi Han Xin, sword immortal Li Bai, demigod Hou Yi, dark night blood girl, as well as ten gods, eight sages, three sages...the kingdom of kings, the weak and the strong. , There are countless heroes, ha! Watch me break through Jixia, make trouble in Chang'an, guard the Great Wall, smash the canyon, unlock the seal, and turn a Nuwa into the emperor! Remember, wretched development, don't worry!
